mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = 2 AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

select BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,MEMBER_ID ,TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "BOARD_CREATE_DATE" ,TRIP_PLAN_THUMBNAIL from board join member on (BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) join TRIP_PLAN on (BOARD_TRIP_PLAN_NO = TRIP_PLAN_NO) where BOARD_CATEGORY = 2 AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

select B.BOARD_NO ,B.BOARD_TITLE ,B.BOARD_CONTENT ,M.MEMBER_ID ,TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "BOARD_CREATE_DATE" ,T.TRIP_PLAN_THUMBNAIL from board B join member M on (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) join TRIP_PLAN T on (B.BOARD_TRIP_PLAN_NO = T.TRIP_PLAN_NO) join REGION R on (R.REGION_NO = B.BOARD_REGION_NO) where B.BOARD_CATEGORY = 2 AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.MEMBER_ID
AND B.BOARD_TITLE
AND R.REGION_NAME
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

select TRIP_PLAN_NO ,TRIP_PLAN_TITLE ,TO_CHAR(TRIP_START_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "TRIP_START_DATE" ,TO_CHAR(TRIP_END_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "TRIP_END_DATE" ,LOCATION_NO ,TRIP_PLAN_THUMBNAIL ,ATTRACTION_NO ,ATTRACTION_NAME ,ATTRACTION_CHANGE_NAME_IMG ,REGION_NO ,REGION_NAME ,TRIP_N_DAY from TRIP_PLAN join member on (TRIP_PLANNER_NO = MEMBER_NO) join location using (TRIP_PLAN_NO) join ATTRACTION on (LOCATION_ATTRACTION_NO = ATTRACTION_NO) join REGION on(ATTRACTION_REGION_NO =REGION_NO) where TRIP_PLANNER_NO = #{memberNo}

select TRIP_PLAN_NO ,TRIP_PLAN_TITLE ,LOCATION_NO ,TRIP_PLAN_THUMBNAIL ,ATTRACTION_NO ,ATTRACTION_NAME ,ATTRACTION_CHANGE_NAME_IMG ,TRIP_N_DAY ,REGION_NO from TRIP_PLAN join member on (TRIP_PLANNER_NO = MEMBER_NO) join location using (TRIP_PLAN_NO) join ATTRACTION on (LOCATION_ATTRACTION_NO = ATTRACTION_NO) join REGION on (REGION_NO = ATTRACTION_REGION_NO) where TRIP_PLAN_NO = #{tripPlanNo} order by TRIP_N_DAY
select MAX(TRIP_N_DAY) from TRIP_PLAN join location using (TRIP_PLAN_NO) where TRIP_PLAN_NO = #{tripPlanNo} ORDER BY TRIP_N_DAY

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(BOARD_MODIFY_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "BOARD_MODIFY_DATE" , BOARD_REPORT , MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PROFILE_IMG , BOARD_TRIP_PLAN_NO , BOARD_REGION_NO , TRIP_PLAN_NO , TRIP_PLAN_THUMBNAIL , LOCATION_NO , TRIP_N_DAY , ATTRACTION_NO , ATTRACTION_NAME , ATTRACTION_CHANGE_NAME_IMG FROM BOARD join member on (MEMBER_NO = BOARD_WRITER) join TRIP_PLAN on (BOARD_TRIP_PLAN_NO = TRIP_PLAN_NO) join LOCATION using (TRIP_PLAN_NO) join ATTRACTION on (ATTRACTION_NO=LOCATION_ATTRACTION_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_CATEGORY = 2 AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' order by TRIP_N_DAY

from board B join member M on (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) join REGION R on (B.BOARD_REGION_NO= R.REGION_NO)
